column1: I've been living with a shadow overhead
column2: 我已在阴影之下生活了多久
column3: I've been sleeping with a cloud above my bed
column4: 我辗转反侧在乌云之下多久
column5: I've been lonely for so long
column9: I just can not seem to move on
column11: I've been hiding all my hopes and dreams away
column12: 我把希望和梦想隐藏了多久
column13: Just in case I ever need them again someday
column14: 就是想要有一天能再次发光
column17: To clear a little space in the corners of my mind
column18: 去清理思绪中的小小角落
column19: All I wanna do is find a way back into love
column20: 我所有想要的只是重新找回爱情
column21: I can't make it through without a way back into love
column22: 否则的话我又该如何才能够渡过
column26: I've been watching but the stars refuse to shine
column27: 星光不愿照耀我已经有多久
column28: I've been searching but I just don't see the signs
column29: 我看不到任何征兆已有多久
column30: I know that it`s out there
column32: There is got to be something for my soul somewhere
column33: 一定有什么在等待着我的心
column34: I've  been looking for someone to share some lights
column35: 我想找人分享光亮已经多久
column36: Not somebody just to get me through the night
column37: 不仅仅是陪我度过漫漫夜晚
column40: And I'm open to your suggestions
column42: All I wanna do is find a way back into love
column43: 我所有想要的只是重新找回爱情
column44: I can't make it through without a way back into love
column45: 否则的话我又该如何才能够渡过
column46: And if I open my heart again
column48: I guess I am hoping you'll be there for me in the end
column49: 我想最终你会站在我这一边
column54: There are moments when I don't know if it's real
column55: 有一刻我不敢相信一切是真的
column56: Or if anybody feels the way I feel
column57: 要是有人感受到我的感受
column61: 而不是另一场冷冷的谈判
column63: All I wanna do is find a way back into love
column64: 我所有想要的只是重新找回爱情
column65: I can't make it through without a way back into love
column66: 否则的话我又该如何才能够渡过
column67: And if I open my heart to you
column69: I'm hoping you'll show me what to do
column70: 我希望你告诉我做什么
column71: And if you help me to start again
column73: You know that I'll be there for you in the end
column74: 你知道我最终会站在你这边
